testCase.name: Auth tests should register new user

Auth tests should login as user
Auth tests should give error with wrong token
Auth tests should give 404 status with wrong url
Auth tests should get users

Auth tests should update a single user

Auth tests should update a Forum
Auth tests should create new Post
